title:
Geometric analysis on weighted manifolds under lower $0$-weighted Ricci
  curvature bounds
abstract:
We develop geometric analysis on weighted Riemannian manifolds under lower
$0$-weighted Ricci curvature bounds. Under such curvature bounds, we prove a
first Steklov eigenvalue estimate of Wang-Xia type on compact weighted
manifolds with boundary, and a first eigenvalue estimate of Choi-Wang type on
closed weighted minimal hypersurfaces. We also produce an ABP estimate and a
Sobolev inequality of Brendle type.
